Connect with me on <a href="https://github.com/ddsjoberg">GitHub</a>, <a href="https://twitter.com/statistishdan">Twitter</a>, or <a href="https://linkedin.com/in/ddsjoberg/">Linkedin</a>.

I am happy to answer your _gtsummary_ questions, but please do **not** email me with questions. 
It is best for the community if questions are asked on a public forum.

- **Questions**? Post to [stackoverflow.com](https://stackoverflow.com/), use the _gtsummary_ tag, and I will be notified of your post.

- **Bug Reports**? Add a [GitHub Issue](https://github.com/ddsjoberg/gtsummary/issues)
